name: 実況
text:
和泉選手
集中力を高めているようですね……
trans:
Team Member Izumi.
It seems her concentration is increasing...

name: 実況
text: 一文字目をゆっくりと丁寧に書いていきます！
trans: Her first letter is written slowly and conscientiously!

name: 実況
text: 和泉選手、一文字目を書き終え、手を止めています
trans: Team Member Izumi's hand has stopped after writing her first letter.

name: 愛依
trans: ...Alright...

name: 実況
text:
二文字目を書いていく！
集中力は全く乱れておりません！
trans: She writes her second letter! Her concentration hasn't waivered at all!

name: 愛依
trans: ...Alright...

name: 実況
text:
和泉選手、書き上げました！
これはかなりの出来です！　さぁ、注目の得点は──
trans: Team Member Izumi has finished writing! What craftsmanship! Then, let's see the judging-

name: 愛依
text: ふふーん
trans: Hmhm-hm～

name: 冬優子
text: おはようございまーす♡
trans: Good morniiing♡

name: 冬優子
text: ……って愛依だけなのね。随分早いじゃない
trans: ...Oh it's just Mei huh. She's surprisingly early.

name: 愛依
text: おっはよ～！　これ見たくてさ～
trans: Morning～! Good to see ya～

name: 冬優子
text:
何これ
綺麗な字ね、有名な人の作品とか？
trans:
What's this? It's very pretty writing,
did some famous person do it?

name: 冬優子
text:
それか社長の趣味だったり？
額に入れてるなんて相当ね
trans:
Is it like the president's hobby?
It's good enough to frame right?

name: 愛依
text:
え？　マジ？　そう思う～？
サンキュ、冬優子ちゃん♪
trans:
Eh? Seriously? You think so~?
Thank you, Fuyuko-chan♪

name: 愛依
text: これ、うちの字なの！
trans: That's my handwriting!

name: 愛依
text:
ほら、この前『アイドル書道大会』出たじゃん？
その時１位とったやつだよ～♪
trans:
Here, it's from that 'Idol Calligraphy Contest'
I was in before, right?
I got first place in it～♪

name: 冬優子
text: そういえば、そんなこと言ってたわね……
trans: Come to think of it, you did mention that...

name: 冬優子
text: 確かに、これなら納得……
trans: I definitely believe it looking at this...

name: 愛依
text: アッハハ～、もっと褒めて褒めて～
trans: Ahhaha～, keep praising me more and more～

name: 冬優子
text: そう言われると褒めたくなくなるんだけど
trans: If you keep saying that I won't want to though.

name: 愛依
text: えー、つめたーい
trans: Ah, you are too cold!

name: 冬優子
text:
けど、あんたに
こんな特技があったなんてね
trans: But, to think you had such a special talent.

name: 冬優子
text: 正直、意外だから少し驚いたわ
trans:
Honestly, I was a little surprised because
it was just so unexpected.

name: 愛依
text:
アハハ、よく言われる～
ちっちゃい頃から近所のばーちゃんに習ってたんだ♪
trans:
Ahaha, people say that often～
I was learning from my neighborhood granny
since I was little♪

name: 愛依
text:
今回優勝したこともさ
いっちばん最初に言いに行ったよ～！
trans:
I also won this time, see.
She's the first person I went to tell～!

name: 愛依
text:
そしたらちょー喜んでくれたの！
めっちゃ嬉しかったし！
trans: She was pretty pleased! Like, super happy!

name: 冬優子
text:
あれ？
『習ってた』ってことはもうやってないの？
trans:
Huh? You said you were learning from
her but not any more?

name: 愛依
text:
ばーちゃんがね、うちが中学上がったくらいの時に
教室続けられなくなっちゃったんだよね
trans:
When I got into middle school, granny wasn't
able to continue giving me lessons any more.

name: 冬優子
trans: Ah...

name: 愛依
text:
あ、気にしない気にしない！　
腰やっちゃっただけで、それ以外は健康！
trans:
Ah, don't worry, don't worry! It's just her posture,
she's fine otherwise!

name: 愛依
text: ちょーピンピンしてんだから！
trans: She's totally energetic still!

name: 冬優子
text: そっか……
trans: I see...

name: 愛依
text:
それに、習字はやめてないんだ～
時間ある時は家で書いたりしてんの！
trans:
Besides, I haven't stopped my calligraphy～
Whenever I find the time I practice at home!

name: 愛依
text: 見せに行くとばーちゃん喜んでくれるからさ♪
trans: Granny gets happy when I go to show it to her♪

name: 愛依
text: あ、もちろんうちが好きってのもあるけどね！
trans: Ah, of course I like doing it to!

name: 冬優子
text: ……いいとこあるじゃない……
trans: ...Guess she has some good points...

name: 愛依
text:
え！？　なになに～？
もしかしてまた褒めてくれたの～？
trans:
Eh!? Hm, what～!?
Could it be you're praising me again～?

name: 冬優子
text: 何も言ってないわよ
trans: I didn't say anything.

name: 愛依
text: 褒めてくれたんなら大きい声で言ってくれていいのに～
trans:
Make sure if you're praising me that you
say it loud and clear～
